issue.title: [CF 1499] Overwrites Profiles
issue.body:
Hi guys,

it's the fourth time that happens to me. Every time I change my character (therefore also the profile) the last created profile overwrites all those before. I do not know what to do. It's frustrating. Thanks in advance for your reply.


> Posted by CurseForge user n3utro | Imported from CurseForge issue #1499 | Raw

comments.body:
I'm going to need more detail than that to help here. What do you mean by "last created profile"? Are you manually creating profiles yourself? Or are you just using the default, per-character profiles that are automatically created for you? Any other information that you can provide would also be helpful.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Ok, i'll give you an example. My last created character was a monk and when I created his profile (I was very careful to create a new profile called "monk") all the spells that I set went to overwrite the profiles "war" "rog" "mage" ecc.. So when i login  with another character i saw "monk"'s spells. On all other profiles!! Help me plz. Thank you.

 


> Posted by CurseForge user n3utro

Sounds to me like you're setting up your icons in global groups instead of profile groups. Do the groups that are getting overwritten have green borders around them when you're configuring them?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yes m8 but when i change i'm on the right profile. How is it possible? Before writing i tried a lot in the general settings. It seems to be what you said. What can I do? Thank you and sorry for the inconvenience.


> Posted by CurseForge user n3utro

Ok i'm done. I' ve found the problem. Thank you!!!


> Posted by CurseForge user n3utro
